# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: SMTPService - Should initialize with valid config
jsonParse - throws SyntaxError on invalid JSON
Deepmerge - Effect Service - respects custom options for merging arrays
validImage should have "custom" image with format "web"
produces an effect that dies with the correct error message for DialectDeterminationError

getDialect identifies SQL dialect correctly sqlite
setLocals - throws error for unknown key
quoteIdent correctly quotes identifier for postgres
Clack - useClackErrorPromise returns Effect that fails with ClackError if error is thrown
Clack - useClackError returns Effect that succeeds with value if no error is thrown
updateToggleElmLabel updates toggle label for "toggle2" correctly
produces an effect that dies with the correct error message for SqlError
pageContentComponentFilter - throws error if comp is undefined
useTranslations returns correct translation for key "unknown"
switchLanguage switches path to selected language
remapFilterSitemap should correctly map and filter sitemap entries
useTranslations returns correct translation for key "description"
remapFilterSitemap should return correct locations for filter 'blog'
User Utility - verifyUsernameCharacters
parameters: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and underscores (_)

CheckIfUnsafe.username - should return true for username "admin"
remapFilterSitemap should return correct locations for filter 'blog'
validImage "studiocms-blocks" should have non-null light and dark properties
SMTPService - Should initialize with proxy config
Encryption Module - encrypt and decrypt Uint8Array roundtrip
Page - should validate complete page data
Deepmerge - Effect Service - throws an error if the service merge function throws
rendererComponentFilter - throws error if comp is empty string
should throw StudioCMSCoreError for unsupported favicon extension
should create integration with custom options
sitemap-index.xml template generates correct XML for empty entries
quoteIdent correctly quotes identifier for mysql
SMTPService - Should fail to send email with invalid options
Drizzle - makeQuery - Should use TransactionContext if available
updateToggleElmLabel updates toggle label for "toggle1" correctly
updateSelectElmLabel updates select label for "qux" correctly
Category - should validate complete category data
should have a valid entry for image name: studiocms-blocks
decode-data-xml - should have the expected length
setLocals - merges security values without overwriting general/plugins
User Utility - verifyUsernameLength
parameters: Username must be between 3 and 32 characters long

children.name: getFileSizeInKilobytes returns fractional for non-exact sizes

Drizzle - execute - fails with LibSQLClientError on error
